question: 寂しい
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>lonely</kanji>? It's still <vocabulary>lonely</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic:
Since this word consists of a kanji with hiragana attached, you can bet that it will use the kun'yomi reading. You didn't learn this reading yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

No one is as <vocabulary>lonely</vocabulary> as a <reading>sa</reading>d <reading>bee</reading> (<ja>さび</ja>). The sad bee is sad because it has no friends and that makes is super lonely. Poor sad bee.
